questions.question: Predict how all three transistor currents (IB, IC, and IE) will be affected as a result of the following fault:

answers.b: Base current unchanged, collector current stops, emitter current decreases to value of base current (IE = IB).
answers.c: All three currents greatly increase, transistor will likely overheat and fail.
answers.d: Base current unchanged, collector current increases slightly (ideally will not change at all!), transistor dissipates more power in the form of heat (may overheat)

explanations.a: You have choosen option (a). The answer is correct
explanations.b: You have choosen option (b). The answer is incorrect
explanations.c: You have choosen option (c). The answer is incorrect
explanations.d: You have choosen option (d). The answer is incorrect
